q: Their answer: Too many middle managers. Guess what? Many, perhaps most, of the middle managers are MBAs or have backgrounds in sales and marketing. I'll reiterate what I wrote 12 months ago: Microsoft manages middle management by way of seemingly perennial reorganizations. Another reorganization may soon come. If Steve Ballmer is really serious about stirring up innovation, he can't move around the deck chairs on the Titanic. He's got to save the ship, starting by jettisoning

It was meant to point out that there was broad support in Eastern Europe and that href="http://www.earthtimes.org/tag/France.html"> France and href="http://www.earthtimes.org/tag/Germany.html"> Germany did not speak for the entire continent. Ironically, my comment was unintentional, Donald Rumsfeld writes.`` I had meant to say France and Germany represented` old NATO' not` old Europe'.''`` In any event, the phrase` old Europe' entered the vernacular. As reported, a number of members of Congress have been href="http://www.nytimes.com/2011/01/21/business/economy/21bankruptcy.html"> quietly looking into possible amendments to the federal bankruptcy code to accommodate the states, which can not now declare bankruptcy.

In the fourth quarter, they http://wn.com/Allen Iverson_Allen Iverson_1st_Win_as_a_Pistons_vs_LeBron Jamess_30pts_9asts_7rebs_08/09_NBA For a veteran like Allen Iverson , a win in November against a lottery team rarely registers as important. After losing his first two games with his new team, that wasn't the case with this victory. Allen Iverson had 30 points, nine assists and provided a spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento LeBron Jamess on Tuesday night.`` It was a huge lift off of me, Allen Iverson said.`` I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I
